column1: On COVID the choice between Joe Biden and Trump is clear. Joe's plan will get the virus under control and help protect vulnerable Black communities. Trump has no plan and doesn't care about the huge impact of COVID on Black America. #BidenHarris2020 #VoteBlue2020 #VOTE #GOTV https://t.co/wvGiLJAaYn

Early Vote begins this Monday! Our nation is being confronted with monumental challenges.  The COVID-19 pandemic continues its rampage tens of millions of people are out of work and America is confronting racial injustice that has marginalized too many people. (1/2)
🚨 The polls close at 7:00 PM! I’m running for re-election to fight the spread of COVID help our economy recover hold Trump accountable and expand access to affordable health care. (1/2)

Our nation is confronting a series of monumental challenges. The COVID-19 pandemic continues its rampage tens of millions of people are out of work and America is confronting the racial injustice that has marginalized too many people. (1/3)

🚨 TODAY is the last day of Early Vote.  I’m running for re-election to fight the spread of COVID help our economy recover hold Trump accountable and expand access to affordable health care.  I would be humbled and honored to earn your vote. #FL20 #VOTE #GOTV https://t.co/qsndEuFkFp
I'm running for re-election to fight the spread of COVID help our economy recover hold Trump accountable and expand access to affordable healthcare. (1/2)
We should be working together to fight COVID-19 and doing all that we can to help all Floridians throughout our state. https://t.co/eyn1SrO8bV

ICYMI: The COVID-19 pandemic has changed the way states must ensure people can vote safely which includes expanding vote-by-mail options for the American people.  #MailTheVoteFL #VoteByMail https://t.co/k7WevQeMby

Yesterday the House passed the bipartisan #CARESAct.We must fight to ensure that workers across America are protected during this public health crisis.State and local governments are leading the fight against COVID-19and America’s health care workers are on the frontlines (1/3)
It is imperative that the Senate act immediately and fully support the Families First Coronavirus Act! (3/3) https://t.co/HvTA1k8yIQ

Early this morning I voted in favor of the Families First Coronavirus Actwhich will provide critical support in combatting the global Coronavirus pandemic that includes: paid leavefree Coronavirus testingunemployment benefits food assistance protection for health care (1/3)
